From: Chalhoub University <Chalhoub.University@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-06-19 11:39
Subject: Unlock Your Learning Journey with Chalhoub University
--------------------------------------------------


 

Dear Hagop GHAZARIAN, 

 

At Chalhoub Group, we believe that growth is not just a destination, but a continuous journey of exploration and amazement. We noticed you have not had a chance to explore Chalhoub University <https://chalhoubuniversity.com/course/view.php?id=3339&section=2> , and we would love to reintroduce you to the opportunities waiting for you.

 

We have curated the learning pathways designed to support your growth within the Administrative Job Family <https://chalhoubuniversity.com/course/view.php?id=3026>  helping you build the key skills and knowledge needed to thrive in your role and beyond.

 

Request your Coursera license today and gain access to thousands of courses led by the world’s best institutions.

 

	
		 
 

 

 


Here are a few handpicked courses to get you started:

 

Budgeting and Scheduling Projects | Coursera <https://www.coursera.org/learn/schedule-projects?msockid=0bf48b4cbae667091db09e25bbef66c0>
